Package application

Class FirstController

java.lang.Object
application.FirstController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class FirstController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class addes the functionality to the 1st Stage where pizza order is taken.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FirstController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add_to_order()
    Adds selected Pizza to the order
    void add_toppings()
    Adds the topping selected by user to another ListView for user to see.
    void clear_button()
    Reset's the 1st Stage to it's default mode which is same as it was set in initialize method.
    void enable_disable_addAndRemove_options​(boolean value)
    Disables add and remove Topping buttons and ListView that provides list of available toppings from the Stage if value passed in is true.
    void initialize​(java.net.URL arg0, java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
    Initialize initial settings at the beginning.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ListViewToArrayList()
    Converts selectedToppings ListView to an ArrayList
    void pizzaSelection()
    Based on the Pizza Selection in the ComboBox, Pizza images and related attributes are set
    void remove_toppings()
    Removes the selected topping from ListView where selected toppings are stored.
    void setDeluxeToppings()
    adds predetermined toppings of Deluxe Pizza to ListView which holds all the selected toppings
    void setHawaiianToppings()
    adds predetermined toppings of Hawaiian Pizza to ListView which holds all the selected toppings
    void showOrder()
    Set's up a new Stage and passes pizza order details to second controller.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL arg0, java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
      Initialize initial settings at the beginning.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • add_toppings

      public void add_toppings()
      Adds the topping selected by user to another ListView for user to see. Also, makes sure no more than 6 toppings or already selected topping is not added.

    • remove_toppings

      public void remove_toppings()
      Removes the selected topping from ListView where selected toppings are stored.

    • clear_button

      public void clear_button()
      Reset's the 1st Stage to it's default mode which is same as it was set in initialize method.

    • setDeluxeToppings

      public void setDeluxeToppings()
      adds predetermined toppings of Deluxe Pizza to ListView which holds all the selected toppings

    • enable_disable_addAndRemove_options

      public void enable_disable_addAndRemove_options​(boolean value)
      Disables add and remove Topping buttons and ListView that provides list of available toppings from the Stage if value passed in is true. Otherwise, enables the buttons and ListView
      Parameters:
      value - value based on which enabling and disabling has to occur

    • setHawaiianToppings

      public void setHawaiianToppings()
      adds predetermined toppings of Hawaiian Pizza to ListView which holds all the selected toppings

    • ListViewToArrayList

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ListViewToArrayList()
      Converts selectedToppings ListView to an ArrayList
      Returns:
      arrayList where the ListView is stored

    • add_to_order

      public void add_to_order()
      Adds selected Pizza to the order

    • pizzaSelection

      public void pizzaSelection()
      Based on the Pizza Selection in the ComboBox, Pizza images and related attributes are set

    • showOrder

      public void showOrder()
      Set's up a new Stage and passes pizza order details to second controller.
